key_themes: AI infrastructure spending and tech sector dominance
Fed policy trajectory and liquidity cycle dynamics
Valuation extremes versus earnings deterioration risks
Regulatory uncertainty in fintech and European equities
Housing supply-demand imbalances and crypto infrastructure adoption
risk_factors: Record market cap-to-GDP ratio (218%) signaling valuation extremes
Earnings guidance deterioration in enterprise software and fintech sectors
Regulatory tightening from Federal Reserve and international supervisory bodies
Liquidity cycle peaking with institutional caution (Buffett 57% cash)
Deteriorating market breadth despite headline index strength
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: $680 active support (60k OI), $700 active resistance (144k OI). QQQ: $620 immediate resistance (39k OI at Max Pain), $619.43 current level testing pivot
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: $688 Max Pain gravitational pull, $630 major Put Wall support if breakdown occurs. QQQ: $620 Call Wall caps upside, $590 support (78k OI), $574.78 major Put Wall. Consolidation with downside bias into Q1 per Twitter analysis
